mapper.select: select asin, title, releaseDate, detailPageURL, largeImage from Kindle where asin = #{asin}

select K.asin, K.releaseDate, K.title, K.mediumImage from Kindle K, kindleregist R where K.asin = R.asin order by
K.releaseDate desc
K.releaseDate asc
R.insertTime desc
K.releaseDate desc
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
select distinct releaseDate from Kindle where releaseDate >= #{date} order by releaseDate
select asin, releaseDate, title, mediumImage from Kindle where releaseDate = #{releaseDate} order by releaseDate desc

select asin, author, binding, format, isAdultProduct, label, manufacturer, productGroup, productTypeName, publicationDate, publisher, releaseDate, title, content, detailPageURL, largeImage, mediumImage from Kindle where asin = #{asin}
